title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Campus Apocalypse, Vol. 2
description: Now that he's received his Eva, Shinji Ikari commits himself to doing battle with the Angels terrorizing the NERV Foundation Academy. However, when he finds out what's going on between Kaworu and Rei, Shinji begins to feel nagging doubt about truths, facts, relationships â€” even his own existence! Is he a burden to his teachers, friends, and family, or does he have a greater destiny?The second installment of Neon Genesis Campus Apocalypse presents Shinji with his toughest challenge yet!
author: Ming Ming
